title: Volcano climbing
itinerary: Private 4×4 transfer to the trail head of the active Concepción Volcano for guided climb to the summit for those in very good condition. This is a challenging 6-9 hour hike with heat, loose rocks and at times high winds. Bag lunch on the cone. Since our hikes are private you can go as far as you wish at the pace you desire. Return to Santo Domingo for lodging at the exclusive San Juan de la Isla.
description: The Island of Ometepe is like no other island in the world, and not just because it is the biggest volcanic lake island on our planet. but also its sensual shape, formed by two towering volcanoes wrapped in tropical forest. It rises out of Lake Nicaragua like two magma pyramids pointed to the heavens.
included: All mountain and river guide expenses
Private mainland private transfers with a/c and profesional driver
